j_with_dois.description: All journal which have listed at least one doi

n_articles_no_dois.description: All articles which have no defined dois

n_articles_processed.description: All articles which are been processed during the first pipeline step

total_dois_used.description: All dois (with no repetition) which are used for the adding journal operationin the second pipeline step

total_dois_repeated.description: All dois which are repeated inside the same or in another journal

total_dois_accepted.description: All articles (with repetition) which have both a defined journal and a defined doi
